member.name: T:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.GibraltarEventProvider
member.summary: A standard ASP.NET Health Event Provider that uses the Gibraltar infrastructure.

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.GibraltarEventProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new instance of the health provider.

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.GibraltarEventProvider.Flush
member.summary: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into Gibraltar.

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.GibraltarEventProvider.ProcessEvent(System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent)
member.summary: Processes the event passed to the provider.

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.GibraltarEventProvider.Shutdown
member.summary: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.GibraltarEventProvider.GenerateLogMessage(System.Exception,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Create an alternate message for an exception.
member.param: The original exception we want to base our message around

member.name: P:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.GibraltarEventProvider.Description
member.summary: A text description of this event provider for administration tools

member.name: T:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.ExceptionSourceProvider
member.summary: Serves as an IMessageSourceProvider to attribute a message to the code location which threw an Exception.
member.remarks: This class looks at the StackTrace of a thrown Exception, rather than the current call stack, to attribute a message to the code location which threw that Exception rather than to where the call is made to log the Exception.

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.ExceptionSourceProvider.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Construct an ExceptionSourceProvider based on a provided Exception.
member.remarks: The first (closest) stack frame of the first (outer) Exception will be taken as the originator of a log message using this as its IMessageSourceProvider.
member.param: The Exception whose first stack frame is the declared originator.

member.name: P:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.ExceptionSourceProvider.MethodName
member.summary: Should return the simple name of the method which issued the log message.

member.name: P:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.ExceptionSourceProvider.ClassName
member.summary: Should return the full name of the class (with namespace) whose method issued the log message.

member.name: P:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.ExceptionSourceProvider.FileName
member.summary: Should return the name of the file containing the method which issued the log message.

member.name: P:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.ExceptionSourceProvider.LineNumber
member.summary: Should return the line within the file at which the log message was issued.

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.HttpRequestMetric.Suppress
member.summary: If called prevents the metric from recording its result when disposed (likely because it wouldn't be considered valid)

member.name: M:Gibraltar.Agent.Web.Internal.HttpRequestMetric.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.summary: An ASP.NET HttpModule for performance tracking with Gibraltar.

member.summary: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the module that implements .

member.summary: Initializes a module and prepares it to handle requests.
member.param: An that provides access to the methods, properties, and events common to all application objects within an ASP.NET application
